plugin.name: xBroadcast_state
plugin.author: Bast
plugin.purpose: Sends a broadcast on various mud states, so far first active state, and ice age
plugin.description:
[FOR PLUGIN AUTHORS ONLY]
Broadcasts about different states in the mud Broadcasts 1 - firstactive - This will be broadcast when a character becomes active for the first time after login 2 - iceage - This will be broadcast when an ice age occurs

trigger.match: \*\* As the ice age passes, life starts to return to normal. \*\*
trigger.name: iceage

muclient.script:
internalrevision = "$Rev$"
dofile (GetPluginInfo (GetPluginID (), 20) .. "luapath.lua")
require "var" require "pluginhelper" require 'ldplugin'
firstactive = false
function iceage() phelper:broadcast(2, 'iceage', 'iceage') end
function reconnect() firstactive = true end
